mapper.sql: select co_seq, email, category, subject, content, readhit, regdate from co_board
mapper.update: update co_board set readhit = readhit + 1 where co_seq = #{co_seq}
mapper.insert: insert into co_board(co_seq, category, subject, email, content, readhit, regdate) values(co_seq.nextval, #{category}, #{subject}, #{email}, #{content}, default, default)
